field.comment: The name of the captured variable
field.name: name

field.comment: The value of the captured variable
field.name: value

field.comment: Whether or not it is an identifier
field.name: identifier

field.comment: If the value was captured by a process action, link it
field.name: processActionInstanceId

field.comment: If captured through a predefined definition, link it
field.name: processCaptureId

field.comment: You can "overwrite" data, we don't want to throw away the historized version. Instead we deactive it so only one version for each name is active.
field.name: active
